thread.title: BRIEF-Novra Technologies Received Two New Orders Totaling More Than $3.2 Mln Can From International Radio Broadcaster

title: BRIEF-Novra Technologies Received Two New Orders Totaling More Than $3.2 Mln Can From International Radio Broadcaster

organizations.name: mln can from international radio broadcaster reuters

text:
April 9, 2018 / 1:05 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Novra Technologies Received Two New Orders Totaling More Than $3.2 Mln Can From International Radio Broadcaster Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 9 (Reuters) - Novra Technologies Inc: 
* RECEIVED TWO NEW ORDERS TOTALING MORE THAN $3.2 MILLION CAN FROM INTERNATIONAL RADIO BROADCASTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
